description: Try our easy to follow Mint Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mint Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh mint leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the mint in a serving bowl and add the sugar and vinegar. Set aside to infuse for 10 minutes.
Stir well to make sure the sugar has dissolved, then taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more sugar or vinegar, if needed. Serve with lamb.
